findProvidedCapabilityInHostingStack

public static Capability findProvidedCapabilityInHostingStack(EClass capabilityType,
                                                              Unit unit)
Finds a provided capability of the specified type down the unit's hosting stack.

Parameters:
capabilityType - the capability type.
unit - the unit from which to start the search (the unit's provided capabilities are not searched).
Returns:
the capability found, null if it does not exist, or multiple instances are found, or if a cycle is detected
